name: Cannot update the "point scale" of project strange values -- @1.8

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "This is not a valid custom point scale."

parameters.name: message
parameters.value: This is not a valid custom point scale.

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
